title: 谁知道传送地标怎么收取物品
author: JockerMan
txt_content: 如题，传送地标如何收取物品，指令传送地标的时候也要收物品。

replies.author: yellow_Gay
replies.txt_content:
需要第三方插件
比如gate星门
或者cc菜单
bs菜单

replies.author: chendian
replies.txt_content: 用指令牌子或者sb 脚本

replies.author: JockerMan
replies.txt_content:
